title: First Post: Welcome to the Community!
content:
Hello everyone! This is the first post on our new platform. We're excited to build a vibrant community together. Share your thoughts, ideas, and projects!

What are you hoping to see and do here?

comments.content: This looks great! Excited to be here.

title: Understanding React Server Components
content:
Hey developers! I've been diving deep into React Server Components and Next.js App Router. It's a paradigm shift but offers some incredible performance benefits. 

Key takeaways:
- Reduced client-side JavaScript.
- Improved initial page load times.
- Direct data fetching on the server.

What are your experiences or questions about RSCs?

comments.content: Great summary! I'm still wrapping my head around when to use 'use client'.

title: My Favorite AI Tools for Productivity
content:
Sharing some of my go-to AI tools that have significantly boosted my productivity:
1. ChatGPT/Claude for drafting and brainstorming.
2. GitHub Copilot for coding assistance.
3. Perplexity AI for research.

What are your favorites?

title: Upcoming Community Guidelines (Draft)
content: We are working on updating our community guidelines. This is a draft for feedback. Please review and share your thoughts.
